verses.roman:
adbhuta caitanya-līlāya yāhāra viśvāsa
sei jana yāya caitanyera pada pāśa

synonyms: adbhuta—wonderful; caitanya-līlāya—in the pastimes of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yāhāra—anyone whose; viśvāsa—faith; sei—that; jana—person; yāya—makes progress; caitanyera—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; pada—the lotus feet; pāśa—near.
translation: Only a person who has firm faith in the wonderful pastimes of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu can approach His lotus feet.
